mapper.sql: id, contract_id, create_time, department, applicant, email, remark, money, status,type,review
mapper.select: select e.*,c.brand_name,c.constract_num from examine e INNER JOIN contract c ON e.contract_id = c.id where e.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into examine (id, contract_id, create_time, department, applicant, email, remark, money, status ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into examine
id, contract_id, create_time, department, applicant, email, remark, money, status, type, review,

update examine
contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applicant = #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, review = #{review}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
